name: The ULTIMATE guide to surviving in a fantastical fantasy land.
name_original: The ULTIMATE guide to surviving in a fantastical fantasy land.
description:
The game was made from scratch, using only assets from the people in the team. Only assets that were not made by the team was post processing.

DISCLAIMER : It is possible to win! even if it doesn't look like it

You play as a pilgrim, that has been chosen to pass the Pilgrimage of Trials. In this strange part of the desert where the pilgrimage takes place, there are many strange things , don´t be afraid to ask for help from the denizens!
